name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	Content
1	  2/23, 2/24	 Chapter 8 nucleophilic substitution
2	  3/2, 3/3	         Chapter 9 alkynes
3	  3/9, 3/10	         Chapter 10 conjugation in alkadienes and allylic systems
4	  3/16, 3/17	Chapter 11 Arenes and aromacity
5	  3/23, 3/24	Chapter 11 Arenes and aromacity
6	  3/30                Exam I (Chapter 8, 9, 10, 11)
          3/31	        Chapter 12 electrophilic and nucleophilic aromatic substitution
7	  4/6, 4/7	        Chapter 12 electrophilic and nucleophilic aromatic substitution
8	  4/13, 4/14	Chapter 13 spectroscopy; Chapter 14 Organometallic Compounds 
9	  4/20, 4/21	Chapter 15 alcohol, diol, and thiols
10	  4/27, 4/28	Chapter 16 ethers, epoxides and sulfides
11	  5/4, 5/5	        Chapter 16 ethers, epoxides and sulfides
12	  5/11                Exam II (Chapter 12, 13, 14, 15, 16)
          5/12	        Chapter 17 aldehyde and ketones
13	  5/18, 5/19	Chapter 17 aldehyde and ketones
14	  5/25, 5/26	Chapter 18 carboxylic acid
15	  6/1, 6/2	        Chapter 18 carboxylic acid
16	  6/8, 6/9	        Chapter 19 carboxylic acid derivatives
17	  6/15, 6/16	Chapter 21 amines
18	6/23                  Exam III
scorePolicy:
所有考試題目都是英文出題，可使用翻譯機或字典。
Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %) 
及格分數為60分 
考試未出席且未請假，分數為0分計算。
考試請假只有1次機會且不補考，成績由其他2次考試分數平均 x 0.7 計算。
materials: Francis A Carey and Robert M. Giuliano, Organic Chemistry, 9th Edition, McGraw-Hill International Edition
